utACK fa30b060eec1f51238292a63039dcc7943abf236

SVG's XML is interpreted and created differently. No need for bikeshedding there.
Thanks to both Marco and Luke!\n
The size of the SVG isn't changed...\n

This is not required. You can tell the program of your choice what dpi to sample at.

Nonetheless, I changed it to `92` for this svg, as well as for all `connect-$N.svg`
